iati-activity.description: The project is framed within an active citizenship, effective states logic. By establishing and evolving a democratic culture, effective public institutions and meaningful citizens# participation in public affairs, African people will demand the deliveryof key political, social and economic rights standards. By informing and empowering citizens to demand implementation, politicians and civil servants will see that continental standards have national and local political relevance. These processes will provoke policy dialogues with national authorities on the resources, mechanisms and prioritization required. Over the past one year this theory has beendeepened and it will be tested further in the next three years based on the experience of the projecttodate.
